page.title: 13Children's Games 1 (Pembrey)
page.content: When it is playtime we have lots of games we can play. These are some of them: {Starting a game: Ibble Obble; One potato,Two potato;All in the middle and the oddman's out. {Chasing games: Polo;Off to London;Bull Dog;Cat and Dog;Sticky,Sticky Glue. {Ball games: Donkey;BallTouch;Soldiers;Cabbage; Queeny,Queeny;Piggy in the Middle. {Group games (Circles): I sent a letter to my love;Doris Day; Orange Ball;My Girl's Aquainted. {Skipping games: Up and Down the Ladder;I like Coffee; Cowboy Joe;Keep the Kettle boiling. {Other games: Marbles;Conkers;Piggy Back Fights; Pile On;Hop Scotch;French Skipping; Mob;King of the Castle.
